user_guide.title: User Guide
user_guide.card_desc: Find answers to common questions about using the app.
user_guide.track_bus_content: Go to the dashboard, find your bus, and click the 'Track' button. A live map will show you the bus's current location.
user_guide.book_ticket_content: From the dashboard, click the 'Book Ticket' button on your chosen bus. Select your start and end stops, then confirm your booking to generate an e-ticket.
user_guide.use_chatbot_content: Click the chat icon at the bottom-right corner. You can ask questions about bus routes, timings, and other general information.
